import React, { useState } from "react"; import "../../App.css"; import "./Contact.css"; import Footer from "../../components/Footer/Footer"; import { useTranslation } from "react-i18next"; import axios from "axios"; export default function Contact() { const [data, setData] = useState({ name: "", email: "", Phone: "", message: "", }); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const mailData = { name: name, email: email, phone: phone, message: message, }; console.log(mailData); axios .post("http://127.0.0.1:8000/send-mail", mailData) .then((res) => { console.log(res.mailData); }) .catch((error) => { console.log(error); }); }; const { t } = useTranslation(); return ( <>
